page.title: 15INDUSTRY
page.content: The biggest Industrial company in the Havant area is{I.B.M.}I.B.M does a large amount of export trade to Europe and America.They sell different products in the field of electronics especially buisiness computers. { Halmatic Ltd} are in the boat building trade.They specialise in medium size yacht and cruiser hulls { Lewmar}is noted for winches,often in stainless steel.The reason for the amount of yachting firms is because of the location (by the sea).{Deep Sea { Seals}make rubber seals also for the marine industry.{Marconi Defence Ltd specialises in missiles,while{Plessey develops communication.{Kenwoods}make kitchen products.{WYETH}and{Norsk { Hydro}make medicines and plastics and { A.S.W.U.}weld steel units.All these companies operate from both sides of the Havant by-pass.
